castColumnTypeOperation.description: A transform operation that casts a column to a different type. See cast_column_type_operation.

createColumnsOperation.description: An operation that creates calculated columns. Columns created in one such operation form a lexical closure. See create_columns_operation.

filterOperation.description: An operation that filters rows based on some condition. See filter_operation.

projectOperation.description: An operation that projects columns. Operations that come after a projection can only refer to projected columns. See project_operation.

renameColumnOperation.description: An operation that renames a column. See rename_column_operation.

tagColumnOperation.description: An operation that tags a column with additional information. See tag_column_operation.

untagColumnOperation.description: A transform operation that removes tags associated with a column. See untag_column_operation.
